description: Amendments to planning permission dated 2nd April 2015 (RN:12/07668/FULL) for development of an office building comprising canal-side reception with 21 storeys of offices measuring 34,184m2 (GIA) and including 132m2 of either Class A1/A2/A3 use at canal-side and first floor level, alongside pedestrian linkages to Paddington Station and Bishop's Bridge Road, in conjunction with landscaping and other associated works. (This application is accompanied by an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA). Namely: The rationalisation of the southern transfer structure; the introduction of external amenity space on each office floor level (levels 04-18); the adjustment to the southern fa√ßade by 1.05m; and amend the description of development to remove the floorspace figures.
site_name: Triangle Development Site Situated Adjacent To Paddington Station
